item.title: How To Advertise Your Business with Effective Ads
item.author: iragoodman@hughes.net
item.description: Want to know how to advertise your business? Ads should be tested in order to eliminate ineffective copy to increase the opportunity for successful marketing. Many new business people have very limited budget for ad testing. A couple of free testing approaches are discussed in this article.
item.itunes:author: iragoodman
item.itunes:subtitle: How To Advertise Your Business with Effective Ads
item.itunes:summary: Want to know how to advertise your business? Ads should be tested in order to eliminate ineffective copy to increase the opportunity for successful marketing. item.title: How To Avoid Facebook Disabling Your Page for Business Networking
item.author: iragoodman@hughes.net
item.description: Advice is provided on how to avoid the disabling of your Facebook personal page. This advice is based on personal experience with this issue.

item.itunes:subtitle: How To Avoid Facebook Disabling Your Page for Business Networking

item.title: Proven Sales Techniques for Success
item.author: iragoodman@hughes.net
item.description: The core of the proven sales techniques system emphasizes follow-up and persistence. It can be applied to direct sales or online sales. It moves people through the sales funnel. And, it works whether it involves selling a new idea or an established one. The system works a prospect through a robust series of sales steps.
item.itunes:author: iragoodman
item.itunes:subtitle: Proven Sales Techniques for Success

item.title: EPISODE4 - MLM without Selling
item.author: iragoodman@hughes.net
item.description: Michael Taynor had failed at MLM for 10 years with 10 different programs. He felt like a failure because those he recruited into his programs didn't recruit or sell. He finally hit success when he joined a company that does everything for him: builds his list, sells and allows him to participate in multiple streams of income.
item.itunes:author: iragoodman
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE4 - MLM without Selling
